/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with power lines and traffic lights, a common sight in many urban areas. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
